title: Museum PASIFIKA Art & Culture (Half-day)
overview: Explore Southeast Asian art and culture at Museum PASIFIKA in Nusa Dua.

stops.description: Arrive and begin exploring the galleries.

title: Museum PASIFIKA Full Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of art, culture, and workshops at Museum PASIFIKA.

stops.description: Arrive and explore all galleries and special exhibits.
Participate in art workshops or guided tours.
